articles.content: The 'Boy In The Tent' has challenged Rylan Clark to "try camping for three years" as the TV personality takes on a mountain challenge. Rylan, 34, is currently tackling a snow-capped mountain in the C… [+2914 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Newton
articles.title: Queen Camilla handed sweet note from fan with adorable Princess Charlotte request - The Mirror
articles.description: Queen Consort Camilla visited a charity supporting domestic abuse survivors in London, where she met a young girl who passed a note to her and asked for it to be given to Princess Charlotte
articles.content:
While out on duty, fans are usually eager to present flowers and other gifts when meeting royals. 
But when one little girl met the Queen Consort on a charity visit today she gave her a crumpled not… [+2786 chars]
